InstructionData.Title: Pump Monitor and Controller
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # Pump Controller​ # Mode: VPC-100​ alias Pump d0​ alias Display d1​ alias setting r0​ alias active r1​ alias t0 r10​ ​ start:​ l setting db Setting​ min setting setting 100​ max setting setting 0​ sge active setting 0 # active if Pump Setting >= 0​ s Pump Setting setting​ s Pump On active​ s Display Setting setting​ yield​ j start
